name: For Odin
description:
My fifth game jam entry.

The Game is made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 149

Theme: Last one left

This time it is more a prototyp. And I want to work on it after the jam.

Right now I am not satisfied with the overall feeling. So stay tuned for the next updates.

Description:

Fight against the hords of hell. Make odin proud as last surviver of your familie. 

Take your hammer and get ready to smash.

Controlls:

Movment - W/A/S/D

Attack - Left-Mouse

Special Attack - Right-Mouse
